CHANNEL_CREATE_PK_NOT_VALID: The public encryption key your browser sent us doesn't appear to be valid. Please Try again or contact us!
CHANNEL_CREATE_OWNER_NOT_MATCH: The channel owner doesn't exist or match Hive records. Please try again or contact us!
CHANNEL_CREATE_OWNER_ERROR_FIND: We encountered an error whilst trying to find the owner, this could mean the nodes we use are down.
CHANNEL_CREATE_EMPTY_NAME: We can't create channels with empty names, sorry!
CHANNEL_CREATE_LONG_NAME: You can't have a channel name which is more than 50 characters, sorry!
CHANNEL_CREATE_ERROR_SQL: Error Saving Channel. Please Try Again Later.
INVITE_UPLOAD_FIELD_WRONG_LENGTH: Sorry, this invite has an invalid field (by length/formatting) this is likely a programming error. Please contact us!
INVITE_UPLOAD_HASH_WRONG: The Invite Hash You've provided seems to be wrong. Try regenerating it and if it still doesn't work, contact us!
INVITE_UPLOAD_ERROR_FIND_CREATOR: We couldn't find the link's creator on Hive, either hive is down or you don't exist ðŸ˜² (or I wrote some bad code)
INVITE_UPLOAD_ERROR_EXPIRES: This invite has already expired or isn't a date.
INVITE_UPLOAD_ENCRYPTED_WRONG: This invite wasn't encoded properly after encryption or some data was lost. Please try again.
INVITE_UPLOAD_EXTRA_BYTES_MISSING: You didn't send extra bytes, these are needed for security reasons. Please try again.
INVITE_SQL_FAIL: Couldn't connect to the database to insert invite. Please try again with a new link
SIGNATURE_USER_KEY_NOT_EXIST: We couldn't find the User Specified to verify this transaction.
SIGNATURE_KEYS_NOT_MEET_THRESHOLD: Your account is multi signature, and you haven't provided enough signatures to prove ownership.
TRANSACTION_NO_SIGNERS: We couldn't read any of the operations to find signers, so this transaction was dropped.
TRANSACTION_ERROR: Error processing transaction. Please try again.
RECEIVED_TOO_LATE: This transaction took over 20 Minutes to be received by the server, so we can't send it. Please resend it.
TRANSACTION_NONCE_USER_NONE: We couldn't work out what user some of the operations belong to, and so we can't work out your next nonce.
NOT_A_WRAPPED_TRANSACTION: This transaction is not in the correct format for us to be able to respond to it. Rejected.
TRANSACTION_ERROR_BAD_JSON: Couldn't decode this transaction. Is it valid JSON?
